|brand = Linksys |model = SPA2102 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router, analog phone gateway, VoIP phone adapter |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Sipura;SIP316FF;SIP316FF, K469, TSVFQ1M857; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;29LV160C8TC-90G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = ISSI;IC42S16400-7TG; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Micrel;SPN801024; |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0E:08
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = Programmable CMOS SLIC/Codec with ringing/battery voltage generation; Silicon Labs; Si3215-FM;;2 |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000FKP55K |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|Sipura}}
*[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r27716637-Unlock-Unlocking-Linksys-SPA2102-adapter On '''DSLReports''' forums] (PCB images) <small> *The '''Linksys SPA2102''' is gateway router/analog telephony adapter (commonly referred to :as ATA) with two FXS ports, which allows for the connection of two “normal” telephones to :a VoIP provider using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) protocol. The product is based :on the SPA-2100, made by '''Sipura''' Technology, which was acquired by [[Cisco]] in 2005. *The ethernet chip is likely a custom version made for '''Sipura'''. The board picture :(see bellow) shows a ''Micrel SPN801024'' with lot number GFK7344.1M01. *Another picture [http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/attachment.php?s=8f37fccd51028ae31d7b3c66a615744f&attachmentid=382&d=1281192427 (found here)] shows a Micrel '''SPNZ801030''' whit lot number GFS7976.1. :Both lot numbers are close to GFK7343.1MEG and GFS7975.1MED found in the '''Micrel''' :MTBF report (see links & screenshot), which identify a '''KS8842''' chip. </small>
===Components=== :[http://www.zlgmcu.com/mxic/pdf/NOR_Flash_b/MX29LV160DTB_DS_EN.pdf MX29LV160DTB Datasheet] :[http://pdf.datasheetcatalog.com/datasheet/macronix/MX29LV160AT.pdf MX29LV160AT Datasheet] :[http://www.insidegadgets.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/IC42S16400.pdf IC42S16400 Datasheet] • [http://www.icsi.com.tw/index.html ISSI (Integrated Silicon Solution, Inc.)] :[http://www.silabs.com/Support%20Documents/TechnicalDocs/si3215.pdf Si3215 Datasheet] :[http://www.silabs.com/Support%20Documents/TechnicalDocs/si321xppqxevb.pdf Si321x Evaluation Board Documentation] :[http://www.micrel.com/index.php/zh/products/lan-solutions/switches.html Micrel Product Overview (Switches)] :[http://www.micrel.com/_PDF/qualrel/TSMC_.15.pdf Micrel MTBF Report / Lot Number list] :[http://www.micrel.com/_PDF/Ethernet/KS8842M_pb.pdf KS8842M Product Brief] :[http://www.micrel.com/_PDF/Ethernet/datasheets/KSZ8842MQL_DS.pdf KS8842M Datasheet] [http://reverse.0cpm.org/grandstream/datasheet/KSZ8842MQL.pdf (mirror)]
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/unified-communications/spa2102-phone-adapter-router/data_sheet_c78-502137.html Datasheet] :[http://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/csbpvga/spa2102/quick_start/guide/spa2102_quick.pdf Quick Start Guide] :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/voice_ip_comm/csbpvga/ata/administration/guide/ATA_AG_v3_NC-WEB.pdf Aministration guide] :[http://www.connectdatasolutions.nl/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Linksys-SPA2102-ATA-User-guide.pdf User Guide (babyTEL)] :[http://support.thinktel.ca/index.php/ajax/downloadFile/1d68c878-f8d5-11e1-bbab-000c290940b2/Provisioning%20Guide%20Linksys%20SPA.pdf Linksys SPA provisioning Guide] :[http://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/csbpvga/spa2102/release/notes/spa2102_rn_v5-2-10.pdf Release notes v5.2.10] :[http://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/csbpvga/spa2102/release/notes/spa2102_rn_v5-2-12.pdf Release notes v5.2.12] :[http://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/csbpvga/spa2102/release/notes/spa2102_rn_v5-2-13.pdf Release notes v5.2.13] :[http://software.cisco.com/download/release.html?mdfid=282414111&flowid=5965&softwareid=282463187&release= Firmware v5.2.3 - v5.2.13] :[http://software.cisco.com/download/release.html?mdfid=282414111&flowid=5965&release=5.2.3&softwareid=282562500&sortparam= Profile Compiler (SPC) v5.2.3 - v5.2.13 Linux/Win32]
